author: Staff Reporter
text:
Three persons who were part of the gang that hurled country-made bomb outside the court premises on February 22 were detained under the Goondas Act here on Monday.

A 20-member gang hurled country made bomb on history-sheeter Chelladurai and John. However, they escaped unhurt and the bomb hit the court wall and exploded. S. Silambu alias Silambarasan (31), the main accused in the case, and his accomplice R. Vijay alias Viki alias Vignesh (26) and K. Manikandan were arrested by the city police. Since many cases were pending against them and found to be involved in disturbing the public peace, City Police Commissioner Sumit Sharan ordered their detention under the act.
title: Three detained under Goondas Act
